item.title: Install Snowplow On The Google Cloud Platform
item.description: I’m (still) a huge fan of Snowplow Analytics. Their open-source, modular approach to DIY analytics pipelines has inspired me two write articles about them, and to host a meetup in Helsinki. In my previous Snowplow with Amazon Web Services guide, I walked you through setting up a Snowplow pipeline using Amazon Web Services. This time around, I’m looking at the wondrous Google Cloud Platform, for which Snowplow introduced support in an early 2018 release.
